comment.realname: Llyfrgell Genedlaethol Cymru  / The National Library of Wales
comment.author: 37199428@N06
comment._content: Although food rationing was introduced in January 1940, at the same time the women of Sarn and Cwm Baptist Churches in Montgomery managed to prepare enough cakes and buns for a respectable tea at the Recognition Service for their new pastor, the Reverend F. A. Baker.

comment.author: 35806356@N08
comment._content: The overwelming thing that strikes me in almost all these photographs is the  poverty.....bare rooms, children working, all raise a smile though.
